title: Full Health or Full Health Regen Runes Maths?
body:
How much does all of the Magic Regen all add up to?
How much does all the Health add up to?
(not leveling up runes, normal ones)

replies.body: I don't think full HP/5 runes is good on anyone. I think you're better off going with just the HP/5 quints, and then armor and mr seals and glyphs respectively.
Is it worth full health regen?

Tanks tend to run HP/5 because they can survive burst and heal up.

Squishier champs need the base health just to survive the damage

Flat HP regen = 15.57 hp/5 sec (9 yellows, 3 quints, 9 blues)
Flat HP = 205.26 (9 yellows, 9 blues, 9 reds, 3 quints)
